Griezmann has struggled to make his mark at Barcelona since arriving from Atletico Madrid for 120 million last year.

articles.author: Brad Walter
articles.title: NRL family quick to rally after Titmuss tragedy - NRL.COM
articles.description: The NRL family has been quick to rally around family, friends and teammates of Keith Titmuss, a young man who tragically died on Monday.
articles.content:
To team-mates and coaches he was "Keithy" a shy, unassuming young man who many believed was destined for a long and successful NRL career.
As they struggle to comprehend the tragic unexpected death … [+4810 chars]
